column5: This home is close to the heart of the Texas Hill Country, on a hilltop. Youâ€™ll love the home because of the comfy beds, the coziness, the fully-appointed kitchen, the high ceilings, the wonderful views. You will be close to Johnson City, Blanco, Fredericksburg, Austin and San Antonio. My place is comfortable, homey and good for couples and solo adventurers.
column8: Sunny and Bright Hill Country House on a Hilltop
